text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw | 97% | stars now 8123 → est 27808 (range 27776-27840)
   https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw
2) sipeed/picoclaw | 96% | stars now 13931 → est 24387 (range 24319-24455)
   https://github.com/sipeed/picoclaw
3) bwya77/vscode-dark-islands | 94% | stars now 2608 → est 10519 (range 10494-10544)
   https://github.com/bwya77/vscode-dark-islands
4) hesamsheikh/awesome-openclaw-usecases | 94% | stars now 3803 → est 8102 (range 8072-8132)
   https://github.com/hesamsheikh/awesome-openclaw-usecases
5) jlia0/tinyclaw | 92% | stars now 1991 → est 4255 (range 4230-4280)
   https://github.com/jlia0/tinyclaw

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
